This package is not in the original scene release form. It has been repackaged into smaller 142x50mb parts instead of original 72x100mb. There is no accompanying .nfo or .sfv files and my downloaded copy is corrupted. As no one else has complained I am assuming the resulting ISO is ok, but as there is no .SFV file, there is no way of checking which part is corrupted and as it has been repackaged, no chance of downloading and replacing the single corrupted part. Nearly 7 gig of download down the tiolet is a lot and makes me pretty mad that there is no chance for recovery.
Anyone to seed the last RAR ?
